name: DOMEXsmarthome
0:
”Alexa, Open My window”
”Alexa, set my air conditioner to sixty-five degrees.”
”Alexa Turn on my light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your smart home with voice instructions (requires compatible devices)
You will be able to control the lighting, the air conditioning in the windows and the curtains with voice instructions. You can also set complex scenarios
You will be required to log in with the username you received from DOMEX
A DOMEX controller is required for use
